column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It's about 2:15 now - still no pizza. People all around are all getting theirs before us
column2: so I ask them to check on it for us. They bring out this pizza. It's 2:30 now
column3: so an hour and 30 min after we had put the order in to begin with. It takes an hour and 30 minutes to make pizza. No joke there's like a watery
